translation.en: SARAH: Fear.
Fear is something that everyone experiences.
translation.fr: On peut tous en faire l'expérience.

translation.en: Fear is a feeling that we all know.
For me, a fear that shaped my life was...
translation.fr: Une des peurs qui a pesé sur ma vie...

translation.en: God, that sucks.
translation.fr: Rédaction d'entrée à Columbia Ce que c'est nul.

translation.en: Recount a time when you faced a fear, challenge or failure.
translation.fr: Evoquez une peur, un défi ou un échec personnel.

translation.en: How did it define you, or how did you overcome it?
translation.fr: Quels ont été ses effets sur votre vie ?

translation.en: Hello?
Hello?
Tyler? What are you doing? Are you crazy? My mom is gonna hear you.
translation.fr: Tyler ? Tu es dingue, ma mère va t'entendre.

translation.en: You see this mask? Got it on sale. Very scary.
translation.fr: - J'ai eu le masque en solde. - Ça fait très peur.

translation.en: Sorry. I was in the neighborhood.
translation.fr: Pardon, j'étais dans le coin. Tu n'as pas eu mes SMS ?

translation.en: I texted you like 10 times. I told you my phone's off.
translation.fr: Pardon, j'étais dans le coin. Tu n'as pas eu mes SMS ? Mon portable est éteint. Je dois finir ma candidature pour la fac.

translation.en: If I miss this deadline, I don't get into Columbia.
translation.fr: Mon portable est éteint. Je dois finir ma candidature pour la fac.

translation.en: You'll be here with me the next four years.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais rester ici avec moi.

translation.en: Consider me your safety school. Close by, good parties...
translation.fr: Je suis mieux que la fac. Tu t'éclaterais.

translation.en: Oh, really. Do you also offer a creative- writing program?
translation.fr: D'accord. Tu donnes des cours d'écriture scénaristique ?

translation.en: Oh, I'm super creative. Look, I got you a care package.
translation.fr: Non, mais je t'apporte des vivres.

translation.en: Pringles. And a little bit of Red Bull. Heh.
translation.fr: Des Pringles. Et de la Red Bull.

translation.en: Thank you. You're welcome.
You are so busted.
So, so busted. I've got it.
Mom, this is not what it looks like.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas ce que tu crois.

translation.en: KATHY: No, I know what it is. I heard the entire thing.
Do people not whisper anymore?
Hey, I brought Pringles and Red Bull.
translation.fr: Tiens, des Pringles et du Red Bull.

translation.en: You better be quiet 'cause my mom will hear us.
Tyler, go home.
Okay. Uh, just to clarify, do you mean back out the window or out the front?
translation.fr: Juste pour être sûr : je sors par où ?

translation.en: Okay, I'll use the window.
Sorry, Sarah, I'll see you tomorrow.
Ooh! I'm good.
Ah! Still good!
Go to bed. Mom, I can explain.
We'll discuss this in the morning.
Sam is gonna love this. You go to bed too.
What'd I do? I don't need a wingman.
Okay. Going to bed. Hmph.
You need to stop electrocuting yourself
and eat your breakfast. Mom, this is due tomorrow,
translation.fr: Arrête de t'électrocuter et mange. Ça doit être prêt demain et ça vaut la moitié de ma note.

translation.en: and it's worth 50 percent of my grade.
translation.fr: Ça doit être prêt demain et ça vaut la moitié de ma note.

translation.en: How about you eat 50 percent of your eggs?
translation.fr: Mange la moitié de tes œufs.

translation.en: Sonny, seriously?
Sorry. I'm getting close.
Coming.
Coming!
Morning, Ms. Quinn. Good morning, Sam. How you doing?
MAN: Kathy! Thank you for taking Sam.
We'll be back in three days. We owe you.
You definitely do.
Sonny! Grab your backpack.
translation.fr: Sonny ! Prends ton sac à dos.

translation.en: Sarah, let's go! I've got an errand to run
translation.fr: Sarah ! Vite ! J'ai des courses à faire.

translation.en: on the way to school. SARAH: Coming!
translation.fr: Sarah ! Vite ! J'ai des courses à faire. J'arrive.

translation.en: My condolences on your bust last night.
Good thing I'm here, in case any other dudes try to climb through your window.
translation.fr: Je protégerai ta fenêtre des intrus.

translation.en: Sonny. I'm gonna kill you.
Kill him in the car. Okay? Go, go, go.
♪ Halloween with pumpkins And mice ♪
♪ Halloween, it's so nice ♪
♪ Halloween ♪
Faster, faster. ♪ With pumpkins and mice ♪
Hey, Kathy. Hey, kids. Heh, heh.
Mr. Chu.
Wow, you practically got a theme park here.
translation.fr: On dirait un parc à thème.

translation.en: Check this out.
Oh, my-- Oh! Whoa!
It's like being in the movies!
I'm gonna have these puppies up and running in no time.
You know, for the kids.
He doesn't actually have kids, does he? No, he does not. Ooh!
translation.fr: - Il n'a pas d'enfants, si ? - Non.

translation.en: All right, everybody, let's make this quick.
You can each pick out a pumpkin to carve if you want to,
but meet me at the register in five minutes, all right? Okay.
translation.fr: On se retrouve à la caisse dans cinq minutes.

translation.en: Alrighty.
Right here? Really?
Yes, here. Everywhere. It's called marketing.
translation.fr: Oui. Et partout. C'est du marketing.

translation.en: Anything you wanna say to me?
Mom-- Mom, I was working all night. I swear.
I swear, Tyler just snuck over and--
I've just been so stuck on this essay...
You're a great writer. You always have been.
translation.fr: Tu as toujours très bien écrit.

translation.en: When you have to sum up your whole life in one essay, it all just sounds so...
translation.fr: Quand on résume sa vie en un texte, elle paraît...

translation.en: unimpressive.
Honey. I think you're very impressive and very capable.
translation.fr: Chérie. Je te trouve tout sauf anodine.

translation.en: You do?
I do.
Which is why I need you to watch Sonny and Sam this week while I'm working doubles.
translation.fr: D'ailleurs tu vas garder les garçons, cette semaine.

translation.en: Mom! No! My essay is due Friday.
Sonny's bigger than me. He doesn't need a babysitter.
translation.fr: Sonny n'a pas besoin de nounou.

translation.en: Ha, ha. Have you seen what he blows up when he's supervised?
translation.fr: Il fait déjà tout sauter quand on est là.

translation.en: Hon, I know you're focused on getting out of here.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu veux quitter cette ville.

translation.en: But if I don't cover these shifts at work, I could lose my job.
translation.fr: Mais si je dois faire des heures en plus.

translation.en: I need to know I can count on you.
Okay. Fine.
Really? Yes, really.
Well, you have earned yourself some corn cushions, little lady.
translation.fr: Ça mérite bien une semelle orthopédique.

translation.en: Really? Mom.
You're looking real nice today.
translation.fr: Vous êtes très en beauté, Kathy.

translation.en: Thank you. Heh, heh. Blue is very in this year.
translation.fr: Merci. Le bleu est très tendance.

translation.en: I see you got the memo. I guess we're in the know.
translation.fr: - Vous êtes au courant. - Je suis dans le coup.

translation.en: Okay. Hey, you know, the adult diapers are 2- for- 1 if you wanna grab another.
translation.fr: Le deuxième paquet de couches pour adultes est offert.

translation.en: I just need one today. Okay. All right.
I don't need them. They're for the nursing home where I work. Of course.
translation.fr: C'est pour la maison de retraite. J'y travaille.

translation.en: I-- I don't-- Heh, heh. Hey, no judgment.
Um, okay. Heh, heh. I use a toilet. Heh, heh.
All right. Well, hopefully, I'll, uh, see you around soon.
Yeah. Yeah. Thanks for checking me out.
Ringing up my purchases. You know. Yes. Yeah. Well, both.
translation.fr: - Le ticket de caisse, je veux dire. - Oui.

translation.en: Yeah. Heh. I'll just get my diapers and go.
Happy Halloween!
GIRL: Hey, wait up!
Oh, dude, science fair sign- ups.
translation.fr: DU RANGEMENT À FAIRE ? APPELEZ LES FRÈRES BOXON Le concours de science !

translation.en: If I can just get my Tesla Tower to work, easily win. It'd be so cool.
translation.fr: Si ma tour marche, je gagne. Ce serait cool.

translation.en: What do you mean? You're already cool.
translation.fr: Comment ça ? Tu es déjà cool.

translation.en: We are treasure hunters. People respect us around here.
translation.fr: On est des chasseurs de trésor.

translation.en: Ew. TOMMY: Hey, Junk Bros.
SAM: Spit wads? What are you, 9?
translation.fr: Tu as quel âge, neuf ans ?

translation.en: What'd you say?
Sam, what are you doing?
I got this.
You know,
we were gonna TP Principal Harrison's house tomorrow night.
translation.fr: On allait décorer la maison du principal, demain.

translation.en: But now, I think I'm just gonna spend the whole night chasing you guys around.
translation.fr: Finalement, on va plutôt vous traquer.

translation.en: Hey. Boys, move it or you're tardy.
Of course, Ms. Hoover. I was just extolling to my good friends Sam and Sonny
translation.fr: Pardon, je discutais avec mes bons copains Sam et Sonny

translation.en: my deep love for homework and all things learning.
Get to class.
What a jerk.
I'd like to check this book out, please. And you are...?
Oh. Yeah, you have four books you haven't returned since sophomore year.
translation.fr: Tu as oublié de rapporter quatre livres.

translation.en: And your account is frozen.
Damn. It's gonna cost 40 bucks to unfreeze it.
I just spent it on tickets for us to see DJ Bisky at the Den tonight.
translation.fr: J'ai tout dépensé pour des places. DJ Bisky, ce soir.

translation.en: You have to come. You can't say no.
My way of saying sorry for getting you busted.
I- I can't. My mom is making me watch my stupid brother all week and his friend--
translation.fr: Ma mère veut que je garde mon frère.

translation.en: Come on. Don't wait for college to start having fun.
translation.fr: N'attends pas la fac pour t'éclater.

translation.en: Show starts at 8.
Get your brother a babysitter.
Okay. Sam, what do you think?
Nice. Looks just like you.
Yeah. Yeah, you're speaking to a Junk Brother.
translation.fr: Oui, je suis un des Frères Boxon.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am. This afternoon?
Let me check with my associate.
Hang up on her. This is our opportunity.
We're too busy. Stop it. We're doing this.
I have my Tesla Tower project, I have algebra. No way.
Fine, fine, fine! Whatever. Sam.
All right. Fine.
You are in luck. Yeah, we can squeeze you in.
24 Ashley Lane?
No, no problem. No problem.
Yeah. Fear not, ma'am. Junk is our middle name.
translation.fr: N'ayez crainte, on est les rois du boxon.

translation.en: Junk is our-- ? Do you even hear yourself?
translation.fr: Tu entends ce que tu dis ?

translation.en: Get your shoes on. It's time to get rich!
translation.fr: Mets tes pompes, on va faire fortune !

translation.en: I already have my shoes on.
I guess this is it. 24 Ashley Lane.
Twenty- four is the number of people murdered here.
translation.fr: Parce qu'il y a eu 24 meurtres ?

translation.en: All right, Sonny.
Let's do this.
Hey. I don't like the way those things are looking at us.
translation.fr: Je n'aime pas leur petit air.

translation.en: We're treasure hunters, Sonny, remember. Come on.
translation.fr: Allez, on est des chasseurs de trésor.

translation.en: Hello?
SONNY: Some treasure.
This place is definitely haunted.
translation.fr: A tous les coups c'est hanté.

translation.en: Dude, there's more stuff over here. Come on.
translation.fr: Il y a d'autres trucs par là.

translation.en: This room's even worse.
Come on, Sonny, it's not that bad.
There is nothing to be afraid of.
SAM: Who stuffs a cat?
How much are they paying us for this?
translation.fr: Combien on est payés pour ça ?

translation.en: Can't believe you said we'd work for free.
Not for free. The lady said
translation.fr: - Gratos. Tu es fou. - Non. On peut garder ce qu'on veut.

translation.en: we could keep any junk we don't throw away.
translation.fr: On peut garder ce qu'on veut.

translation.en: Some of that stuff can have monetary value.
You know what else has monetary value, Sam?
translation.fr: Ce qui rapporte tout de suite, c'est l'argent.

translation.en: Actual money. Just start cleaning. Come on.
translation.fr: Ce qui rapporte tout de suite, c'est l'argent. Allez, au boulot.

translation.en: Found some more stuff in the attic.
SAM: Okay, what do we got? Maybe this is worth something.
translation.fr: - Ça donne quoi ? - Ça se vendra, ça.

translation.en: It's stuck.
Dude, I think we just found a treasure chest!
Go get it. Jackpot!
This is amazing. It's like a whole room in here.
I told you. We come here, we find treasure.
translation.fr: Je t'avais dit qu'il y aurait un trésor.

translation.en: Help me with this. I bet this thing is filled with gold and diamonds and Bitcoins.
translation.fr: Je parie que c'est plein d'or et de Bitcoins.

translation.en: Uh, you know Bitcoins are cryptocurrency, right? It's not real coins, it's virtual coins.
translation.fr: Impossible, ce sont des pièces virtuelles.

translation.en: It's really cool. It starts with a process called mining--
Stop being a nerd for a second and help.
Yeah, sorry. Thank you. Here.
translation.fr: - Arrête et aide-moi. - Pardon. Merci. Tu es prêt ? Trois, deux...

translation.en: All right. You ready? Three, two, and--
translation.fr: Merci. Tu es prêt ? Trois, deux...

translation.en: What?
It's locked.
Who would lock a book?
Here's a key.
Oh, man.
SAM: Well, what's in it?
Nothing. It's just a beat- up old book.
Doesn't have a title page.
So much for treasure. Well, look.
translation.fr: Tu parles d'un trésor. On a quand même le reste, c'est pas mal.

translation.en: We still have all this stuff. This is a good haul.
translation.fr: On a quand même le reste, c'est pas mal.

translation.en: Just grab the book anyway. It's gotta be worth something. Yeah.
translation.fr: Prends le livre, on pourra le vendre.

translation.en: Sam. Sam, turn around.
SAM: Where did that come from?
My name is Slappy. What's yours?
Wait, I think it says something on the back.
translation.fr: Il y a un truc au verso.

translation.en: SONNY: Karru marri odonna loma molonu karrano.
translation.fr: Karru marri odonna loma molonu karrano.

translation.en: He's so creepy.
It's kind of like he's alive.
I don't think anything's been alive in this house since that cat.
translation.fr: Le dernier truc vivant ici, ça a dû être le chat.

translation.en: I mean, look at this place.
But I'm alive now! Aah!
Oh, Sonny, just give me a kiss. Just one smooch.
That's not funny. Yes, it is. It's hilarious.
It's a business. We're running a business. Take this more seriously.
translation.fr: On est censé être pros. Sois sérieux.

translation.en: It's too easy, Sonny. Come on, man. Hey, I'm taking him.
SONNY: Don't know why you took that thing.
What do you mean? He's awesome. Whatever.
translation.fr: - Il est cool. - Si tu veux.

translation.en: TOMMY: Hey, it's the Junk Sisters!
Oh, great.
Well, at least we know our marketing's working.
No teacher around to save you now.
translation.fr: Pas de prof pour vous sauver.

translation.en: Hey, are you wearing my old sweater from my grandma's yard sale?
translation.fr: T'as récupéré mon vieux pull dans un vide-greniers ?

translation.en: Leave us alone.
Okay. Give me back my sweater and I'll let you go.
translation.fr: Rends-moi mon pull et vous pouvez partir.

translation.en: Really? Unless you want your face punched.
translation.fr: - C'est vrai ? - Où je vous cogne.

translation.en: Whatever.
And your box.
Fine. Just take it.
Yo, what we got?
What's this? Let's see. Old radio.
BOY 1: Is that a ruler? BOY 2: That's a dog toy.
translation.fr: - Une règle ? - Un jouet pour chien.

translation.en: A stupid book.
Great business you guys are running.
Heh. Your turn.
No. No, I'm not giving you my box.
Sam, just give it to him. I like my face unpunched.
translation.fr: Donne-lui. Je ne veux pas qu'il me cogne.

translation.en: No way. We worked for this stuff.
Hey, Tommy! TOMMY: Oh!
Look at that. Tommy, give him back!
Want your doll? You dress him up when you get home?
SAM: Tommy, this isn't funny.
What the-- ?
What is going on?
BOY 1: Tommy, pull up your pants! They're stuck.
Thank you very much. Sonny, we need to go!
Go! Go! Go! No, don't touch my underwear! God! Stop!
translation.fr: Allez-y. Ne touche pas à mon caleçon !

translation.en: No! Go get them! No! Go get them!
Go! Okay, okay, okay!
Better pedal faster!
Come on, don't make it easy for us!
We need to go!
We're gonna get you, man!
They're gaining on us!
Faster!
What just happened? I have no idea.
translation.fr: - Il s'est passé quoi ? - Aucune idée.

translation.en: Get back here, you two!
Ah. Why does this keep happening?
Sarah! You won't believe what happened. You are never going to believe this.
We were in this crazy, abandoned, creepy house
translation.fr: On était dans une vieille maison.

translation.en: and found this fireplace, which had a cat on it I twisted.
translation.fr: On était dans une vieille maison. On a trouvé une cachette secrète.

translation.en: It went to a secret compartment that opened.
translation.fr: On a trouvé une cachette secrète.

translation.en: Then there was a treasure chest.
Okay, but long story short, we found...
translation.fr: En un mot, on a trouvé...

translation.en: this guy!
Th- this guy.
This...guy.
Wow. It's like you're actively trying not to be cool.
translation.fr: Vous faites tout pour ne pas être cool.

translation.en: Here. Mom specifically said you should fold the laundry.
translation.fr: Maman veut que tu plies le linge.

translation.en: I'll be in my room if you need me, but do not need me.
Hey, Sarah? This specifically says you are supposed to fold the laundry.
translation.fr: C'est écrit que tu dois plier le linge.

translation.en: ♪ I spend all the time Waiting at night for you ♪
What am I doing?
SONNY: We already banned jumping.
translation.fr: - Pas le droit de sauter. - T'es trop nul.

translation.en: SAM: I banned sucking, yet here you are. Now, come on.
translation.fr: - Pas le droit de sauter. - T'es trop nul. Allez.

translation.en: It's 4 to 1. Why are you celebrating? Scoring is a reason for celebration.
translation.fr: - Tu es mené 4 à 1. - Je fête mon but.

translation.en: SARAH: Bye, I'm leaving!
Where you going? Out. I'll be back by 10.
translation.fr: - Tu sors ? - Oui. Je serai rentrée à 22 h, ne dis rien à maman.

translation.en: If Mom calls, tell her I'm in the shower.
translation.fr: Je serai rentrée à 22 h, ne dis rien à maman.

translation.en: You were gonna help me with my science presentation.
translation.fr: Tu devais m'aider pour mon exposé.

translation.en: There's two dummies on the couch. Practice on one of them.
translation.fr: Entraîne-toi sur la tête de bois à tes côtés.

translation.en: SAM: All right, there we go.
Sergeant, your orders are to guard this porch.
translation.fr: Sergent, vous devez garder le porche.

translation.en: It was more than a hundred years ago
translation.fr: Il y a plus d'un siècle,

translation.en: when Nikola Tesla first lit up the sky over Wardenclyffe, New York.
translation.fr: Nikola Tesla illuminait le ciel de Wardenclyffe.

translation.en: Tesla wanted to create a world
where anything could be transmitted through giant electric towers:
translation.fr: où tout serait communiqué par des tours géantes.

translation.en: Power, sound, maybe even brain waves.
It was like the original Wi- Fi.
But suddenly and mysteriously, he shut down his lab in 1908.
translation.fr: Mais il ferme son labo, mystérieusement, en 1908.

translation.en: His tower never lit up the sky again.
translation.fr: Sa tour ne s'est jamais rallumée.

translation.en: Until...
today!
May I have a volunteer?
You, sir, in the gray suit.
Hold this and prepare to be amazed.
I present to you all:
Tesla!
Don't give me that look. I'm trying to bring back your tower.
translation.fr: Ne me regardez pas comme ça. J'essaie.

translation.en: I, for one, think it's an electrifying presentation.
Sam. I'm not gonna fall for that again.
Ha- ha- ha. Very funny.
It's like a microphone? You're talking through your cell phone or something?
Sam. Sam, it's a stupid prank.
You ever heard of personal space? Mm!
How are you talking to me right now?
You brought me to life. Don't you remember, Sonny?
translation.fr: Tu m'as donné la vie, Sonny.

translation.en: Sam? SAM: What?
What's the problem?
Just come up here. Please.
Dude, I told you, I don't care about Tesla.
Right now, Sam. SAM: Fine!
I've always wanted a brother.
Please don't try to educate me on Tesla.
Hello, Sam. Thank you for saving me from that moron today.
translation.fr: Sam, merci de m'avoir sauvé tout à l'heure.

translation.en: Oh, he's battery- operated.
No, no, no. Sam, Sam, he's alive.
SLAPPY: Sorry for what happened with Tommy.
I guess you could say he got hosed.
That was you? SLAPPY: Yep.
And now that we're family, we can be brothers!
translation.fr: On forme une famille. Trois frères !

translation.en: I think I'd make a great Junk Brother.
translation.fr: Je serai un bon Frère Boxon.

translation.en: Right. Just a sec. Sidebar.
Are we losing our minds? I don't think we can at the same time.
translation.fr: - On devient fous ? - Pile en même temps ?

translation.en: Okay, but just to clarify, we're talking to a puppet right now.
translation.fr: Je souligne qu'on parle à un pantin.

translation.en: Maybe he's alive.
Of course I'm alive! Heh- heh- heh.
And I can make all your problems go away.
translation.fr: Et je peux résoudre tous vos problèmes !

translation.en: Didn't your sister tell you to fold the laundry?
translation.fr: Tu dois plier le linge, non ?

translation.en: There. Now you have time to do your homework.
translation.fr: Tu as le temps de faire tes devoirs.

translation.en: Oh, what's that? You don't want to do your homework?
translation.fr: Tu ne veux pas les faire ?

translation.en: That's okay. I just did it for you.
You know algebra?
A squared plus B squared equals of course! Heh, heh.
translation.fr: A plus B au carré égale plus de devoirs.

translation.en: This is amazing. It's all correct.
So you can change all of our grades.
I can only change the things right in front of me.
translation.fr: Seulement ce que j'ai devant moi.

translation.en: But whatever I see, I can bring to life.
translation.fr: Je peux animer ce que je vois.

translation.en: ANNOUNCER: Round one. Fight!
SONNY: That is awesome.
I will never question picking up junk again.
translation.fr: Je ne critiquerai plus jamais le boxon.

translation.en: Wait until Mom and Sarah find out.
SLAPPY: Slow your roll there, kid.
Let's just keep this our little secret for now.
translation.fr: Ça va rester un peu entre nous.

translation.en: Give me a chance to win them over first.
SLAPPY: Ah, you're terrible at this. Heh- heh- heh.
I'm literally crushing you right now.
translation.fr: Je suis en train de t'écraser.

translation.en: Can't believe you're losing to a puppet.
translation.fr: - Tu perds contre un pantin. - Oui.

translation.en: Right. And I'm not even using my magical powers.
translation.fr: - Tu perds contre un pantin. - Oui. J'utilise même pas mes pouvoirs magiques.

translation.en: Back so soon?
Don't ask. SONNY: Are you okay?
What happened? What happened?
Well, turns out the guy I liked is a total scumbag.
translation.fr: Le mec qui me plait est une vermine.

translation.en: Mom expects me to run this entire house by myself.
translation.fr: Maman veut que je fasse tout.

translation.en: And if I don't figure out this essay by Friday,
I'm never getting out of this town. So no, I'm not okay.
translation.fr: sinon je reste coincée ici. Non, ça ne va pas.

translation.en: Why are you guys acting so weird?
Us? Nothing.
SAM: No reason at all. Mm- hm. I'm working on my science project.
translation.fr: - Pas du tout. - Je fais mon exposé.

translation.en: We're just playing video games. Just us two.
translation.fr: - On joue à la console. - A deux.

translation.en: Nobody else. SONNY: Mm- hm.
I'm going to bed.
Good night.
Who just said that?
Me! Sam.
Good night. SONNY: It's a new thing we're doing.
Good night. Good night.
Hit the hay. SONNY: Good night, Sarah.
Night- night.
That is not cool, Slappy.
What the hell?
Ugh. God, they are such tools. TYLER: Boo!
Missed you at the show last night.
Bet you did. You have fun?
It was okay. A bunch of us just hanging out. Totally casual.
translation.fr: On a passé une soirée tranquille. Tu vois ?

translation.en: Right.
What's with the dummy? Oh, him?
We were just hanging out.
Totally casual.
Fly, little ghost.
Hey, whoever that is, can you toss me up some more string?
translation.fr: Tu peux me passer de la ficelle ?

translation.en: SLAPPY: Sure.
That's hilarious.
Oh! Hey, hey, hey, not funny, not funny.
Sarah, stop fooling around.
I'd say you're the one fooling around.
translation.fr: C'est toi qui n'es pas drôle.

translation.en: How are you talking?
I love the theater.
I always bring down the house.
Wait, no! What are you doing? What are you doing?
Tell me, Tyler. What does it say on that top step?
translation.fr: Tyler, que dit la dernière marche ?

translation.en: Uh... It's not a step?
Maybe you'll remember that
the next time you step out of line with my sister.
translation.fr: la prochaine fois que tu fais marcher ma sœur.

translation.en: It was a puppet, man. It was a puppet.
It had these supernatural powers.
He could move things with his mind.
I swear.
She knows! Ask her. It was in her locker.
Please tell him real quick. Sarah, tell him!
It's just the meds kicking in, sir. Last guy said he saw a dragon.
translation.fr: C'est l'effet des calmants. Le dernier voyait des dragons.

translation.en: It wasn't a dragon. It was a puppet.
translation.fr: C'était pas un dragon, mais un pantin.

translation.en: Nikola Tesla constructed this tower right here in Wardenclyffe, New York
translation.fr: Nikola Tesla a bâti sa tour à Wardenclyffe

translation.en: to beam bolts of electricity across the world.
And today...
we are going to beam bolts of electricity across this classroom.
translation.fr: on va envoyer de l'électricité dans la classe.

translation.en: Someone beam me out of this classroom.
May I have a volunteer?
You, ma'am, in the pink sweater.
Hold that and prepare to be amazed.
Behold:
The power of Tesla.
Mr. Quinn, unplug that now!
BOY: That was awesome!
And that was my presentation on Nikola Tesla.
translation.fr: C'était mon exposé sur Nikola Tesla.

translation.en: Any...? Any questions?
Today's picture day!
translation.fr: C'est le jour de la photo !

translation.en: This is not good. I'm so busted.
Oh, great, the fire department's here?
They're definitely gonna make you repeat a grade.
Please tell me you guys had nothing to do with this.
translation.fr: Dites-moi que vous n'y êtes pour rien.

translation.en: Sonny blew up the science wing. It was so cool.
translation.fr: Sonny a fait sauter un mur !

translation.en: It was an accident.
What are you doing here?
Tyler Mitchell just got loaded into an ambulance.
He said the dummy you guys put in my backpack
translation.fr: Le pantin que vous avez mis dans mon sac

translation.en: attacked him with supernatural powers.
We didn't put Slappy in your backpack.
translation.fr: On n'a pas mis Slappy dans ton sac.

translation.en: Get in.
SARAH: You're telling me
that you discovered a walking, talking dummy and you didn't tell me?
translation.fr: Vous avez trouvé un pantin qui parle ?

translation.en: He seemed like a nice guy at the start.
translation.fr: - Il avait l'air sympa. - Bien élevé.

translation.en: He had great manners. He told us to keep it a secret.
translation.fr: - Il avait l'air sympa. - Bien élevé. Il a dit que c'était secret.

translation.en: A, I'm your sister.
And B, as a general rule,
when an animated doll tells you to keep secrets, that's a red flag.
He's not just some doll. He's got powers. He can move stuff with his mind.
You guys, this is insane.
I mean, why would he go after Tyler?
Maybe he heard you complaining about him last night.
translation.fr: Il a dû t'entendre te plaindre.

translation.en: Great. What else did I complain about?
Mom.
Hey, kids, you wanna see the mummies come to life?
translation.fr: Vous voulez voir les momies bouger ?

translation.en: Sorry, Mr. Chu! Don't have time to talk now!
Your loss!
Mom! Ms. Quinn!
Hey. You didn't tell me you got a ventriloquist dummy. How fun!
translation.fr: Vous ne m'avez pas dit que vous aviez une marionnette.

translation.en: He was sitting at the table like a little person.
Hi, kids. My name is Bobo. And I like listening to Mom. Heh, heh.
translation.fr: Salut, je suis Bobo. J'écoute toujours maman.

translation.en: Mom, his name is Slappy, and I would not do that if I were you.
translation.fr: Il s'appelle Slappy et tu ne devrais pas faire ça.

translation.en: Slappy. That's a ridiculous name.
No, no. His name is Bobo.
Mom, you don't understand. Ms. Quinn, he's alive.
translation.fr: - Tu ne comprends pas. - Il est vivant.

translation.en: I think these guys are trying to play some sort of a Halloween prank on us,
translation.fr: Ils essaient de nous faire une farce pour Halloween,

translation.en: but I'm not buying it. Are you? No.
Oh, let me get that. But nice try. Very creative.
translation.fr: J'y vais. Mais c'était bien tenté.

translation.en: Stay right there. Don't go anywhere.
Hi, kids. Good day at school?
Oh, my God. He sounds even creepier than he looks.
translation.fr: Avec la voix c'est encore pire.

translation.en: Ha- ha- ha. We're gonna be such a happy family.
translation.fr: Avec la voix c'est encore pire. On va former une belle famille.

translation.en: You're not our family.
Do it, Sonny. Turn him off.
Hearing you say that makes me mad.
Don't do that. Do it again.
It worked.
And trust me.
You don't want to find out what happens...
translation.fr: Vous ne voulez pas voir ce qui arrive

translation.en: when I get mad.
Well, that was an interesting phone call.
Anything you wanna tell me?
Yes, we've been trying to. That dummy is evil.
You blew up the science lab?
translation.fr: Tu as fait sauter le labo ?

translation.en: Yeah, there was that too.
Do you know how much damage you've caused?
It wasn't Sonny's fault. KATHY: I'm sure it was an accident.
translation.fr: - Il n'y est pour rien. - Un accident ?

translation.en: It wasn't an accident. The dummy did it. Yeah.
Do I look like a dummy to you?
We're telling the truth!
Here's some truth for you. Halloween is canceled for the three of you.
What? Canceled.
Come on. KATHY: You know...
I expect this kind of craziness from the boys.
translation.fr: je m'attends à ça des garçons.

translation.en: But I felt like you were gonna help me keep things under control, Sarah.
translation.fr: Mais je pensais que tu m'aiderais.

translation.en: Mom.
I'm disappointed.
Come on. Mom. Mom, please.
Not as disappointed as I am.
My room. Now.
We've got a problem.
Yeah. I have never seen your mom that mad.
I'm talking about the psycho dummy on our couch.
Did somebody call a family meeting without me?
translation.fr: Une réunion de famille sans moi ?

translation.en: No, no. Slappy, why would you think that?
translation.fr: Non, tu te fais des idées.

translation.en: We were just planning a surprise party for you.
translation.fr: On prépare une surprise party. Pour toi.

translation.en: Well, I've got a surprise for the three of you.
This is my house now.
And under my roof,
I make the rules.
Sorry, but you just got voted out of this family. Huh? Aah! SAM: Oh!
translation.fr: Désolé, mais on vote tous contre toi.

translation.en: What do we do with him now?
Fireplace.
I would have nightmares the rest of my life.
translation.fr: J'en ferais des cauchemars à vie.

translation.en: No. I have a better idea.
SONNY: Ugh. We've been walking forever.
It's like this whole place is made of poison ivy.
translation.fr: Il y a des orties partout.

translation.en: SAM: Stop complaining.
How much farther is it?
Here. This should work.
Am I the only one that feels like we're committing a crime?
translation.fr: J'ai l'impression qu'on commet un crime.

translation.en: It's a dummy. The only crime we're committing is littering.
translation.fr: C'est un pantin. Au pire, c'est un abandon de détritus.

translation.en: Ready? Yeah, yeah.
Okay, watch out.
It's done.
Let's get out of here.
SAM: Sonny, come on.
We just killed a puppet.
Trust me, we had to.
And I say we just forget it ever happened, because no one will believe us anyway.
translation.fr: Oublions tout ça. Personne ne nous croirait.

translation.en: It's over.
He's locked in a suitcase.
There's no way that dummy's getting out.
translation.fr: Il ne sortira jamais de là.

translation.en: Who you calling dummy, dummy?
What do you want from us?
I just want to be part of the family.
SONNY: He's gonna break through the windshield.
Is everyone okay? SAM: Yeah. Think so.
Where's Slappy?
Guys, I think we just made things a thousand times worse.
translation.fr: Je crois que ça va être mille fois pire.

translation.en: ♪ One is a guy That is kind of creepy ♪
KIDS: Trick or treat!
CHU: There you go, Hank.
All right, come on in. Zoink!
Step right up. Don't be scared.
Welcome to my haunted house.
All right. Here you go. Happy Halloween.
Hey, what's up, my witches?
Little Frankenstein humor.
Beat it.
Here you go.
Hey, my princess.
Hey, my cowboy.
BOY: I'm not a cowboy! CHU: Yes, you are. Bye- bye!
translation.fr: - Je ne suis pas un cow-boy. - Je sais !

translation.en: A mysterious disturbance recently took place in the town of Madison, Delaware.
Neighborhoods were ravaged and the high school destroyed.
translation.fr: Plusieurs quartiers et le lycée ravagés.

translation.en: An FBI spokesman said unusual weather patterns were to blame,
translation.fr: Le FBI attribue les dégâts à la météo

translation.en: but there were rumors of a cover- up for something far stranger.
translation.fr: mais on évoque des cas étranges.

translation.en: Sightings of giant insects, Abominable Snowmen, and even...
...an evil ventriloquist dummy.
Oh, we're so dead.
Creatures believed to come alive from the original
translation.fr: - On est foutu. - Ces créatures viendraient des écrits de l'auteur R.L. Stine.

translation.en: manuscripts of horror author R.L. Stine.
translation.fr: viendraient des écrits de l'auteur R.L. Stine.

translation.en: The book. What book?
In that abandoned house, we found this old locked- up book.
translation.fr: On a trouvé un livre dans la maison.

translation.en: And when we unlocked it, that's when Slappy appeared.
translation.fr: On l'a ouvert et Slappy est apparu.

translation.en: Yeah, but Tommy Madigan took it from us.
Well, how do you know the book was written by R.L. Stine?
translation.fr: Est-ce qu'il était de R.L. Stine ?

translation.en: Wait a second.
From 1979 to 1985,
legendary horror author R.L. Stine lived in Wardenclyffe, New York.
translation.fr: l'auteur à succès vivait à Wardenclyffe.

translation.en: SARAH: Here? That's not good.
Stine started his writing career
with a since- unpublished novel titled Haunted Halloween,
translation.fr: par un roman jamais publié, Les Fantômes d'Halloween.

translation.en: a tale of a demonic dummy who sets out to create a family of his own by...
translation.fr: L'histoire d'un pantin maléfique qui se crée une famille...

translation.en: By-- ? By what?
By bringing Halloween to life.
I love a good holiday sale.
Hello, old friends.
If those kids don't want me to be a part of their family,
translation.fr: Ils ne veulent pas de moi dans leur famille ?

translation.en: I'll raise one of my own.
SLAPPY: Trick or treat.
Welcome to the family,
Serving families is what I do. Heh, heh.
translation.fr: Je suis au service des familles.

translation.en: Heh, heh. Come along, then, brother.
Just wait until you see what I have planned next for this town.
translation.fr: Attends voir ce que je prépare pour cette ville.

translation.en: Guys, this is bad.
This is really, really bad. You know what we need to do? We need to call the police.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on appelle la police.

translation.en: And tell them what? That an evil dummy is about to bring Halloween to life?
translation.fr: Pour leur dire qu'un pantin maléfique nous menace ?

translation.en: Yes! SARAH: Great idea, Sam. They'll come and arrest us.
Wait, guys, I found a number. For Stine?
No, says here nobody knows where he is, but this is for Richard Shivers.
translation.fr: Non, il a disparu. Richard Shivers.

translation.en: He's the president of the R.L. Stine Appreciation Society.
translation.fr: Président du club des amateurs de Stine.

translation.en: What are you doing? I'm calling.
RECORDING: Good day, you've reached Dr. Richard Shivers
translation.fr: Vous êtes chez le Dr Richard Shivers

translation.en: and the R.L. Stine Appreciation Society.
translation.fr: du club des amateurs de R.L. Stine.

translation.en: If you're trying to reach Stine, don't bother.
translation.fr: Si vous cherchez Stine, laissez tomber.

translation.en: Otherwise, leave a message.
translation.fr: Si vous cherchez Stine, laissez tomber. Sinon, laissez un message.

translation.en: SARAH: Hi, Mr. Shivers, my name is Sarah Quinn. I live in Wardenclyffe, New York.
translation.fr: Je suis Sarah Quinn de Wardenclyffe.

translation.en: I desperately need to get in touch with R.L. Stine.
This is gonna sound crazy, but I think one of his stories has come to life.
translation.fr: Je crois qu'un de ses romans devient réalité.

translation.en: Hi, Mr. Shivers...
Well...
Looks like we're on our own.
Wait, where are we going?
To find Tommy Madigan and get that book.
Get that one.
No way he's gonna be able to get that. Oh.
BOY: What do these idiots want? I'll take care of this.
translation.fr: - Ils veulent quoi ? - Je m'en occupe.

translation.en: SONNY: We need that book.
It's really important. It's super important.
The book with the lock on it. Okay, okay. What book?
translation.fr: - Le livre avec le verrou. - Quoi ?

translation.en: The one you stole from us, Tommy.
translation.fr: Celui que tu nous as volé.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. I've got it right here.
Oh, really? No, idiot.
translation.fr: - Je l'ai sur moi. - Vraiment ? Non. Pourquoi j'aurais un bouquin sur moi ?

translation.en: Why would I be carrying a book around with me on Halloween?
translation.fr: Non. Pourquoi j'aurais un bouquin sur moi ?

translation.en: Now, go back home with your babysitter. I'll be there in a bit to egg your house.
translation.fr: Rentre chez toi avec ta baby-sitter.

translation.en: Listen, you little punk, I'm not the babysitter. I'm Sonny's sister.
translation.fr: Je suis la sœur de Sonny, petit morveux.

translation.en: You're gonna give us that book back or I'll make your life a living hell.
translation.fr: Rends-nous le livre où je ferai de ta vie un enfer.

translation.en: The only thing you'll use that toilet paper for is to wipe--
translation.fr: Et ton papier-toilette, il te servira...

translation.en: Okay. God, you don't have to be so mean about it.
Let's get out of here.
Book's at my house in my room.
translation.fr: Le livre est dans ma chambre.

translation.en: But it's hidden, so good luck finding it, losers. Heh, heh.
translation.fr: Caché. Bonne chance pour le trouver.

translation.en: Those are some awesome costumes.
Is this actually happening?
Guys, we gotta find that book!
SLAPPY: Evening, Mr. Tesla.
You don't mind if we bring your tower back to life, do you?
translation.fr: Vous permettez qu'on emprunte votre tour ?

translation.en: What did he say?
Shut up.
SLAPPY: Tesla used this tower to project electricity,
but I'm going to use this tower
to project my magic in ways he never imagined.
translation.fr: je vais projeter ma magie comme il n'aurait pu l'imaginer.

translation.en: It takes a genius to know a genius.
Come along, Walter.
We've got work to do.
Very well. Let's go.
SONNY: This is Tommy's house.
Well, I guess we just knock?
SAM: Knock loud. He lives with his grandma.
translation.fr: Fort, il vit avec sa grand-mère.

translation.en: Wait! Guys, there she is.
SONNY: She's asleep. I guess we'll just have to wake her up.
translation.fr: - Elle dort. - Il faut la réveiller.

translation.en: Hello! Tommy's grandma!
Guess she's a deep sleeper.
It's locked.
Find another way in and go get that book. What are you gonna do?
I'm gonna make sure nothing surprises us. Go!
What?
I can't believe we're breaking into someone's house right now.
Hey, they got gummy bears.
Who cares? Stop screwing around.
AUTOMATED VOICE: Hands off!
Sam, stop screwing around. Let's go. Okay, all right.
SLAPPY: Watch this, Walter.
Why settle for a small family, Walter,
translation.fr: Pourquoi se contenter d'une petite famille

translation.en: when we can project my power everywhere
translation.fr: alors qu'on peut projeter ma magie

translation.en: and bring all of Halloween to life?
translation.fr: et donner vie à tout Halloween ?

translation.en: Sam, I found it. Yeah. You found it?
How did we miss that?
That can't be good. Yeah. We gotta go.
Let's just go back out the window. SAM: All right.
translation.fr: - On sort par la fenêtre. - D'accord.

translation.en: The hand has my hand!
Just rip it off! Throw it!
Sam. Turn around.
They're moving.
Sonny, they're just gummy bears.
They're so tiny and cute. What can they do?
Hey there, little guys.
Sam, you just ate half their family. I would not do that if I were you.
translation.fr: Tu as mangé leur famille, laisse-les.

translation.en: Why are they walking towards us?
Okay. All right. Maybe they just want us to stay and play.
God, where is everyone?
Oh, there's one on my back, Sam!
translation.fr: J'en ai un sur le dos !

translation.en: Pull harder! I'm trying!
Go for the window, Sam!
I'm coming!
Just! Stop! Giggling!
Sam! I need some help over here...
Mom, we're under attack!
Sonny, what are you talking about? Where's Sarah? Who's attacking you?
translation.fr: Où est Sarah ? Qui vous attaque ?

translation.en: Gummy bears.
KATHY: What? Honey, you're mumbling. Put Sarah on the phone.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Je t'entends pas. Passe-moi Sarah.

translation.en: Okay, that's it. Do not leave the house! I'm coming home.
translation.fr: Ne quittez pas la maison, j'arrive.

translation.en: Sonny, help!
Sam, I'm coming!
Hurry!
No, no, no! You'll never take me alive!
That is my new favorite book.
You okay? I think.
Let's get out of here.
What are you guys doing in there?
Oh, no big deal, really. Just being mauled by my favorite comfort food!
translation.fr: On se fait attaquer par mes bonbecs préférés !

translation.en: Wait. Just stop. Stop, stop! What are you guys even talking about?
Everything is alive, Sarah. Even candy.
Well, is that the book? Let's read it.
There's something you need to know about this book.
translation.fr: Il faut que tu saches un truc.

translation.en: What?
Look out!
That's what.
This is not a normal book, Sarah.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un livre ordinaire.

translation.en: Who would write this?
Oh, what is this?
Hyah! Oh, you rehearsed that, did you?
Best costume of the night, sir.
GIRL: Go!
WOMAN: Look out, look out! Ah!
There! Let's take the alley. It's empty.
Wait, wait!
We need to read the book and see how we can end this. Let me see.
translation.fr: Il y a peut-être une solution dans le livre.

translation.en: It was nearly Halloween in the town of Wardenclyffe-- Blah, blah, blah. Here!
translation.fr: C'était Halloween... Bla, bla, bla. Là !

translation.en: His revenge was to create a family
by bringing Halloween to life, but that wasn't enough.
translation.fr: en animant Halloween. Mais ça ne suffisait pas.

translation.en: That seems like plenty of revenge to me.
Because he wanted more than a family. He wanted a mother.
translation.fr: Plus que tout, il voulait une mère.

translation.en: His plan was to...
Was to what? Keep reading.
I- I- I can't.
That was the last page. It's an unfinished manuscript.
translation.fr: Il n'y a plus rien, il n'a jamais fini.

translation.en: What?
Okay, great. What do we do now?
Slappy's gonna go after Mom.
That book is the only thing we have to stop him.
We have to go to the nursing home and save her.
translation.fr: Allons à la maison de retraite.

translation.en: Mom's not at the nursing home.
Where is she?
On her way home to save us. What?
She called while we were attacked by gummy bears.
translation.fr: Elle a appelé pendant l'attaque des ours.

translation.en: Why answer at a time like that?
Maybe because unlike you, Sarah, I pick up Mom's phone calls.
translation.fr: Je n'ignore pas ses appels, moi.

translation.en: Really? Guilt trip much?
We need to find your mom before Slappy does. Now, come on, let's go!
Your woodworking skills are impressive.
This will do nicely.
Oh, I used to manage a hardware store.
Walter. Focus, please. Yes.
Now tell my monsters to get me Mama and get me that book.
translation.fr: Que mes monstres m'amènent Môman et le livre.

translation.en: SARAH: Run!
SAM: Duck!
Look out!
SONNY: That's Mr. Peters!
MAN 1: Nice doggy. MAN 2: It's right behind you!
MAN 1: Ah! Not on my leg!
KATHY: Help!
That's Mom! That's Mom! Come on!
PIRATE: You bunch of scallywags!
KATHY: Kids, watch out!
Behind you!
Okay, now's our chance.
Give me the book. I'm gonna protect Mom.
translation.fr: Donne le livre, je protège maman.

translation.en: You get the ladder and meet me at that tree.
Wait till it's safe, then go. Okay.
Oh, my God! We're all gonna die! Run for your life! Ah!
Oh, my God.
Oops. Not a monster.
SAM: All right, let's go!
Come on!
Halt!
My orders are to guard this porch!
translation.fr: J'ai pour ordre de garder le porche !

translation.en: No way.
You like carving pumpkins, huh? Look what you did to poor Terry.
translation.fr: Vous aimez découper des citrouilles. Regardez le pauvre Terry.

translation.en: Hiya! I'm round.
Sergeant Squash, open fire.
We need to find another way in! No. This is my house.
SERGEANT: I'm hit! Medic!
What are you doing? Put me down! Hiya! Happy Easter.
Yes! Let's go.
Sarah, I was so worried. Are you okay?
I'm fine. Just hang tight.
I'm gonna get you down. I promise. I just need you to trust me.
KATHY: Don't worry about me. Run. Hide!
Ghost at 11 o'clock!
No, no, no! Get back here!
SARAH: That's my book! Ah!
We gotta go.
Sarah! Sarah, let go of that ghost!
Do not let go of that ghost!
You okay? No, that ghost took the book.
translation.fr: - Ça va ? - Il a le livre.

translation.en: SONNY: Mom! Oh, kids. Help!
SONNY: It's heading for the Tesla lab.
Slappy brought the tower to life. That's why this is happening.
We have to stop him.
Uh, guys?
Sonny, what do we do? I don't know. You're the older one.
translation.fr: - On fait quoi ? - C'est toi l'aînée.

translation.en: No, no, no. It's me, Mr. Chu!
Shh! Follow me! To the basement now!
Don't ruin the Mylar. I'm saving it for next year. Go, go, go.
translation.fr: Merci de ne rien abîmer. Je garde ça pour l'an prochain.

translation.en: Let me get this straight.
We are living a Goosebumps story right now?
translation.fr: On vit un Chair de Poule pour de vrai ?

translation.en: Okay, clearly you're a fan.
This is the greatest thing I've ever heard!
Hold on. Let me guess, let me guess, let me guess. Um...
Monster Blood.
No, too on the nose. Yeah, you're right. Um...
The Scarecrow Walks at Midnight.
No. Haunted Halloween.
I don't know that one. How does it end?
That's the problem.
It doesn't.
Hello, Mama.
Remember me?
You put me on your lap.
translation.fr: Tu m'as pris sur tes genoux.

translation.en: Put those cute words in my mouth.
What was it you called me? Bobo? Ha- ha- ha.
Can't talk?
Don't you worry.
From now on, I'll do the talking for both of us.
I'm gonna make you so proud, Mama.
translation.fr: Tu seras si fière de moi.

translation.en: It's working.
My mind is literally blown right now.
I mean, we get to finish our Goosebumps story!
translation.fr: On va finir un Chair de Poule !

translation.en: This isn't a creative- writing exercise, Mr. Chu. Slappy has our mom!
translation.fr: C'est du sérieux. Slappy détient notre mère !

translation.en: Yeah, and then you get to save your mom. It's Chapter 22:
The kids save their mom from the demonic dummy.
translation.fr: Les gosses sauvent leur mère du pantin !

translation.en: Well, the only thing I had to save my mom was that book, and I lost it. So...
translation.fr: La seule solution, c'était le livre. Et je l'ai perdu.

translation.en: Sarah. This is not your fault.
translation.fr: Sarah. Ce n'est pas ta faute.

translation.en: If anything, it's my fault. I'm the one who found the book and brought Slappy to life.
translation.fr: C'est moi qui ai trouvé le livre et animé Slappy.

translation.en: And I even told Slappy about Tesla.
translation.fr: Je lui ai même parlé de Tesla.

translation.en: Mom trusted me to take care of you guys, and I told her I would save her.
translation.fr: Maman comptait sur moi pour veiller sur vous.

translation.en: I failed.
I know I always say that I can't wait to go to college and get started on my real life,
translation.fr: Je dis toujours que j'ai hâte de partir vivre ma vie,

translation.en: but you guys are my life.
This is a classic Goosebumps moment. Do you remember Say Cheese and Die-- ?
translation.fr: C'est du Chair de poule. Ça te dit Dangereuses Photos...

translation.en: This is real life, Chu! Okay.
Guys, Slappy is using the Tesla Tower to power Halloween.
translation.fr: Slappy utilise la tour de Tesla.

translation.en: If I can get in there, maybe I can shut it off, and we can save Mom.
translation.fr: Si j'arrive à l'éteindre, maman sera sauvée.

translation.en: But there's monsters everywhere. How are we gonna get past them?
translation.fr: Il y a des monstres partout.

translation.en: Easy.
Camouflage.
Welcome to my crafts lab.
Jeez, they're still everywhere.
It's actually working.
Come on. We gotta get to that tower.
SONNY: I can't believe we're really here. I can barely see out of this thing.
translation.fr: On y est. Je ne vois presque rien.

translation.en: Is it cool? Is it awesome?  Hey, fanboy. Let's focus.
translation.fr: - C'est la classe ? - On se concentre.

translation.en: Right. Sorry.
Let's go.
SARAH : Don't. Move.
Come on, let's go. Come on!
Look at this place.
SARAH: It's so creepy.
Stay close.
SAM: No wonder Tesla abandoned this place.
Shh, shh, shh. Do you hear that?
Come on.
Not Haunted Halloween.
Oh, my writing was so cliché back then.
translation.fr: Je tombais dans les clichés, à l'époque.

translation.en: I knew it! I knew I came up with that first.
translation.fr: Je le savais ! J'y ai pensé en premier !

translation.en: That clever little dummy's writing his own ending.
translation.fr: Ce petit malin de pantin écrit sa fin.

translation.en: Not in my book, he's not.
Oh, gnomes.
Don't you dare.
Stay.
Ow! Son of a-- Ah!
Oh, witches!
Get away, witches!
SAM: Guys, do you hear that? Shh!
Welcome.
Where's my mother?
Don't you mean our mother?
There's my sweet little babies.
I just love a family reunion.
Mom. What did you do?
translation.fr: - Maman. - Qu'est-ce que tu as fait ?

translation.en: SLAPPY: I had a papa once!
He let me down.
But a mother's love is forever.
Turn her back now, you psycho!
Oh, should I?
Unfortunately, I have other plans.
Walter! The book, please.
This book.
Go prepare the tower!
I'm going to do what Stine couldn't:
translation.fr: Je ferai ce que Stine n'a pas pu.

translation.en: Finish this book, once and for all.
translation.fr: Je mettrai le point final à ce livre.

translation.en: Spoiler alert:
The manuscript gets destroyed in that tower,
translation.fr: le texte est détruit dans la tour

translation.en: and my Halloween family lasts forever!
Mama, babysit the children for me.
Yes, dear.
We can't let him destroy that book.
Sonny, turn this thing off. I'm going after Slappy.
translation.fr: Sonny, la tour. Je suis Slappy.

translation.en: Just you and me now, Slappy.
translation.fr: Il n'y a plus que nous.

translation.en: Can't hear you. I'm too far ahead of you. Hee- hee- hee!
translation.fr: Je n'entends rien, j'ai trop d'avance.

translation.en: SONNY: This is amperage and this is voltage?
None of these cables make any sense. What about here? Start pulling levers.
translation.fr: - Je n'y pige rien. - J'appuie sur des trucs.

translation.en: No, no, Sam, don't! Ah!
Slappy booby- trapped all this stuff.
Careful, Sarah. It'd be a shame to fall from that height.
translation.fr: Attention, ne va pas tomber, surtout.

translation.en: Plenty more where that came from.
translation.fr: Il y en a encore plein d'autres.

translation.en: Come on, Sonny, turn this thing off.
Oh, no. Sonny hurry up. Slappy's at the top. Do something.
translation.fr: Slappy est en haut. Fais quelque chose

translation.en: I can't do it, Sam.
Come on, Sonny. You are the smartest kid I know.
translation.fr: Tu es le plus malin de tous.

translation.en: Sam, I couldn't even do my little science project. Slappy did that.
translation.fr: Même mon exposé, c'est Slappy qui l'a fini.

translation.en: And even that one shorted out.
translation.fr: Et ça a fini en court-circuit.

translation.en: Wait. That's it.
We turn it up. All the way up. We blow the fuse.
translation.fr: On monte à fond pour que ça saute.

translation.en: Yes! The fuse is over there.
And now to finish this story and destroy the town.
translation.fr: Détruisons la ville, pour finir l'histoire.

translation.en: What do you think you're doing?
Writing my own ending.
Spoiler alert: I save the town and put you back where you belong.
translation.fr: Je sauve la ville et je te renvoie d'où tu viens.

translation.en: SLAPPY: What's the matter?
Writer's block?
Again?
Grab that lever. Yes. This one?
On my count, we push up at the same time.
Ready? Go!
Give me the book.
You're not gonna get this book, Slappy.
I have a friend who might think otherwise.
Nowhere else to run, sis!
Fine. You win, Slappy.
I'll give you the book, but you gotta turn my mom back.
translation.fr: Je te le donne, mais change ma mère.

translation.en: Deal.
It all ends Slappily ever after.
You forgot one thing:
Never judge a book by its cover.
translation.fr: Il faut se méfier des apparences.

translation.en: What?
Sonny, what's happening?
We need to get out of here!
It's working!
Go, kids!
Hello?
Someone called for me?
I got your message. I'm here.
Don't worry. Everything's going to be okay.
I need typing paper, a thesaurus, Diet Coke, and a quiet place to compose.
translation.fr: Il me faut du papier, un Coca Light et du calme.

translation.en: Preferably in a comfortable chair with lumbar support.
Are you R.L. Stine?
Me? No, I'm Dr. Seuss. R.L. Stine was unavailable.
translation.fr: Non, je suis le Dr Seuss.

translation.en: Yes, of course, I'm R.L. Stine!
Then I guess this belongs to you.
Don't open it.
My first book.
You realize I wrote this when I was around your age.
translation.fr: J'avais ton âge quand je l'ai écrit.

translation.en: More of an amateur work, really, but I am sure you'll all agree
it shows the undeniable promise of a brilliant young writer.
Why do you have a typewriter?
I was going to save you with it,
although it appears you found a way to save yourselves.
translation.fr: Mais vous ne m'avez pas attendu.

translation.en: A typewriter? It's been done before.
translation.fr: - Une machine ? - Ça s'est déjà vu.

translation.en: Once before.
Maybe twice.
Maybe more.
WALTER: Kathy?
Walter, manager at Fred's Pharmacy. It's nice to see you.
Hi. It's nice to see you too. What are you doing here?
I don't know.
Walter! Walter! You got turned into a monster.
translation.fr: Walter ! Vous êtes devenu un monstre.

translation.en: You were big, green, ugly. You were Slappy's henchman!
translation.fr: Vous étiez le larbin de Slappy !

translation.en: Weather patterns. Very strange weather patterns.
But I think everything's back to normal now.
Fine. Okay, yeah, the weather has been weird. It's true. Okay, thanks.
translation.fr: C'est vrai que la météo est étrange. Merci.

translation.en: KATHY: What happened to your shirt?
translation.fr: C'est vrai que la météo est étrange. Merci. - Votre chemise ? - C'est bizarre.

translation.en: WALTER: I don't know.
Ixnay on the onsters- may.
Go ahead, ollow- fay. SONNY: What?
translation.fr: Tusmo sur les stremon. - Quoi ? - Motus sur les monstres.

translation.en: Means follow. Pig Latin.
Oh, the youth today.
WALTER: So funny running into you.
Right? I always hoped we'd run into each other outside of work.
WALTER: Yeah, me too.
Hey, if you're not busy next week, would you wanna have some dinner?
translation.fr: On pourrait dîner ensemble, cette semaine ?

translation.en: So they don't remember what happened to them?
The transmutation process seems to have wiped their memories clean.
translation.fr: La transmutation a effacé leur mémoire.

translation.en: All those who were affected won't remember a thing.
translation.fr: Les personnes touchées ont tout oublié.

translation.en: SAM: Are you okay? Oh, my God. Guys.
I had this crazy dream.
I'm so glad to see you.
You know, can't believe I'm saying this, but I'm glad to see you too, Tommy.
translation.fr: Je n'en reviens pas de dire ça, mais c'est réciproque.

translation.en: Kids falling from the sky.
My work here is done.
I'm a writer too.
Well, an aspiring, very stuck writer at the moment.
translation.fr: Enfin, j'aimerais. Je bloque en ce moment.

translation.en: My condolences.
All the horrors in the world can't compare to the terrors of the blank page.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pire horreur que celle de la page blanche.

translation.en: Um, any advice on college essays?
Well, first rule of writing: write what you know.
Thirty years, and I couldn't figure out how this book should end.
translation.fr: En trente ans, je n'ai pas trouvé de fin.

translation.en: And somehow you figured out how to finish it in one night.
translation.fr: Toi, il t'a fallu une soirée.

translation.en: I believe in you.
Hm. Write what you know.
SARAH: Recount a time in your life when you faced a fear, challenge or failure.
translation.fr: Evoquez une peur, un défi ou un échec personnel.

translation.en: I think most of us are afraid that we don't have a story to tell.
translation.fr: On craint tous de ne rien avoir à raconter.

translation.en: That there's nothing special about us.
And then a moment comes when you least expect it
translation.fr: Et un jour sans qu'on s'y attende,

translation.en: where you have to step up, no matter how terrified you are.
translation.fr: il faut se montrer à la hauteur, peu importe notre peur.

translation.en: But what I've learned is that it's good to be scared sometimes.
translation.fr: Parfois, la peur a du bon.

translation.en: Scared of losing the people we love.
translation.fr: La peur de perdre ses proches.

translation.en: Stop, stop! It's a ventriloquist dummy.
Oh. Really?
That's not funny, Mom. Too soon.
No, I like it.
Congratulations, Sonny.
Thank you so much, Principal Harrison.
SARAH: Or scared of not achieving our dreams.
translation.fr: Ou la peur que nos rêves nous échappent.

translation.en: Because those moments remind us just how special our stories really are.
translation.fr: Ces peurs nous rappellent que nos histoires sont uniques.

translation.en: Here's to us. Indeed.
Hey, Sarah! Hi, Mr. Chu.
CHU: Watch this.
I like it.
Yeah, I just made it life- size this year. You know, just in case.
translation.fr: Rien de géant cette année. Au cas où.

translation.en: No, seriously, you know, just in case.
Right. I'll see you later, Mr. Chu.
SARAH: And maybe when you face enough of your fears
translation.fr: Quand on a surmonté ses peurs,

translation.en: life stops being so scary after all.
Hey, honey.
What happened?
I got in. I knew it. I knew you could do it.
translation.fr: - Je suis prise. - Je le savais.

translation.en: Oh, I'm so proud of you!
I guess I'm proud.
Thanks, Sonny. Come on, bring it in.
Congratulations.
Here, take off your jacket. Guys, give her some ornaments, please.
translation.fr: Enlève ta veste. Donnez-lui des décorations.

translation.en: I'm so happy! Ha- ha- ha!
Here, put that right there. Yeah, I like that one.
Finally, a new book.
SLAPPY: Hello, Papa.
Slappy! I thought the book got you.
translation.fr: Je te croyais dans le livre.

translation.en: Maybe those others, but not me.
Why is that?
You know I always survive.
You wrote me that way.
In fact, I wrote my own story while I was gone.
translation.fr: J'ai écrit ma propre histoire quand j'étais parti.

translation.en: And guess what.
You're the main character.
You try living in a book for a while, Papa.
translation.fr: Essaie de vivre dans un livre pendant quelque temps.

translation.en: HAND: Hands off!
Hiya! Look at my candle.
SLAPPY: Slappy Halloween.
